title: Self Mystery Chest-ing
body:
I think it would be great to have an event where Summoners get the chance to buy a Mystery Chest for themselves, just like the self Mystery Gifting event. 
Pretty please Riot, make this happen.

replies.body: It has happened a few times.
There hasn't been an event for self Mystery Chest-ing mate.
Yeah, I wanted to get a mystery chest for myself :c
